thread.title: AELOGICA Selected as a 2015 Red Herring Top 100 Asia
thread.title_full: AELOGICA Selected as a 2015 Red Herring Top 100 Asia

author: Steven Talcott Smith
title: AELOGICA Selected as a 2015 Red Herring Top 100 Asia
text:
Red Herring announced its Top 100 award in recognition of the leading private companies from Asia, celebrating these startups’ innovations and technologies across their respective industries. Red Herring’s Top 100 Asia list has become a mark of distinction for identifying promising new companies and entrepreneurs. Red Herring editors were among the first to recognize that companies such as Google, Facebook, Kakao, Twitter, Rakuten, Salesforce.com, Xiaomi and YouTube would change the way we live and work.
“Choosing the companies with the strongest potential was by no means a small feat,” said Alex Vieux, publisher and CEO of Red Herring. “After rigorous contemplation and discussion, we narrowed our list down from hundreds of candidates from across Asia to the Top 100 Winners. We believe AELOGICA embodies the vision, drive and innovation that define a successful entrepreneurial venture. AELOGICA should be proud of its accomplishment, as the competition was as strong as ever.”
Red Herring’s editorial staff evaluated the companies on both quantitative and qualitative criteria, such as financial performance, technology innovation, management quality, strategy, and market penetration. This assessment of potential is complemented by a review of the track record and standing of startups relative to their peers, allowing Red Herring to see past the “buzz” and make the list a valuable instrument of discovery and advocacy for the most promising new business models in Asia.
Founder and CEO, Steven Talcott Smith believes the Red Herring Top 100 Asia award signals an exciting new phase for AELOGICA: “Good things are happening! This is a great boost to our team and recognition for the hard work everyone has put in to make AELOGICA such a great company.” He further adds, “We look forward to launching our new service, appexpress.io , soon and realizing the high expectations placed on us through this award.”
About Red Herring
Red Herring is a global media company, which unites the world’s best high technology innovators, venture investors and business decision makers in a variety of forums, including print, online and exclusive events worldwide. Red Herring provides an insider’s view and access to the global innovation economy, identifying new and innovative technology companies and entrepreneurs.
About AELOGICA
AELOGICA is a global software services provider with a mission to advance business online through superior technology and talent. Specializing in full stack web and mobile applications, AELOGICA provides teams of skilled Ruby on Rails developers to growing companies in US and the Asia/Pacific region from its offices in Manila, Philippines. Learn more at aelogica.com .
